bottom right 3508 9479 top right 3508 9518 top left 3460 9518 bottom left 3460 9479

item.title: [PI] multi zone i have the cords
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

(absX >= 3460 && absX <= 3508 && absY >= 9479 && absY <= 9518) ||

figured it out

thats the pi code put in player.java under multi for kalphite queen mutli

this makes it so two or more can hit kalphite queen

im confused it says “this monster is already in combat” but it has the two swords

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] multi zone i have the cords
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:3, topic:402085”]to get the choords for a “wild” type zone you need to know the X and Y choords

you need to go in a square around the place you want to be “wild” get the ::choords in the cornors of the square

than add it liek this somehow

(absX >= 2946 && absX <= 2959 && absY >= 3816 && absY <= 3831)[/quote]

So what’s the question?
